What information does the `listbanned` command provide in Verus?
The `listbanned` command in Verus provides a list of all banned IPs/Subnets. This can be useful for troubleshooting issues with your Verus node or for identifying potential security risks.

listbanned

List all banned IPs/Subnets.

Examples:
> verus listbanned 
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listbanned", "params": [] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
